title: Which music producers are you currently influenced by? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some quite old ones! Connie Plank who produced a lot of Kraut Rock like Can and Neu! as well as David Bowie’s Low. Martin Hannett who famously produced Joy Division’s two albums. And I still cannot escape the shadow of Hank Shocklee and the Bomb Squad on Public Enemy’s classic records. I’m also a huge fan of Ron Temperton’s arrangements when he was in Heatwave, and later on working with Quincy Jones on Michael Jackson’s hit albums in the 80’s.
